nodes.bodyText: Why did we remove Copyright info?

 distributionBase=GRADLE_USER_HOME

nodes.bodyText: We should  not be changing codec name. This can result in compatibility issues when migrated from ODFE1.4 to 1.6 as segments would be created with KNN80Codec and it would not be able to locate it.
Makes sense. Will Revert everything back to KNNXXCodec naming convention
